issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
I was trying to migrate my node.acs app to arrow cloud.
I hit "appc acs domain --set <domain>"
The following error showed up and I can not complete the migration.

[ERROR] The domain is invalid. 

Please fix.
fields.summary: [Arrow Cloud] Can not set the domain - "The domain is invalid"

comments.body:
Solved this issue.
My DNS record setting was problem.

Thx.
